

# Nancy Data Science

[Nancy Data Science ](https://www.meetup.com/nancydatascience/) is a
Meeting of data analysts, users of statistical programming languages such as Fortran, Java, Julia, Matlab, Python, R. The goal is to exchange "recipes" between professional practitioners of statistical programming languages.
